price: Basi lilitokea tukio juu yake kutoka kwa Mola wako Mlezi, nao wamelala!
arabic: فَطَافَ عَلَيۡهَا طَآئِفٞ مِّن رَّبِّكَ وَهُمۡ نَآئِمُونَ
footnotes: Basi ikaliteremkia shamba hilo balaa kubwa ilio toka kwa Mola wako Mlezi, na hali wao wamelala.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: faṭāfa ʿalayhā ṭāifun min rabbika wahum nāimūna
